SELECT p.id AS procid, p.partcode, i.partname, p.partcategorycode, c.partcategory, p.suppliercode, p.suppliername, p.pruchdemand, p.partcategoryname AS createtime, p.purchstatus, s.phone, s.contacts, s.contactInfo, s.address, s.mailbox, s.fax, p.prucher, p.pruchernum, p.pruchprice, p.totalpurchase FROM partproc AS p JOIN partcategory AS c ON (p.partcategorycode = c.id) JOIN part AS i ON (p.partcode = i.id) JOIN supplier as s on(s.id = p.suppliercode)
and ( i.partname like concat('%',#{keyworld},'%') or c.partcategory like concat('%',#{keyworld},'%') )
and p.purchstatus=#{purchstatus}
and p.partcategoryname between concat(#{starttime},' 00:00:00') and concat(#{endtime},' 23:59:59')
